manipulators.description: osascript -e 'tell application "Terminal" to do script "aerospace join-with left && aerospace layout v_accordion && exit"'

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Terminal" to do script "aerospace join-with left && aerospace layout v_accordion && exit"'

manipulators.description: osascript -e 'tell application "Terminal" to do script "aerospace resize width 415 && exit"'

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Terminal" to do script "aerospace resize width 415 && exit"'
